channel.title: Barrage help plz?
channel.description:
i have barrage on my server it hits EVERYONE in wild... i've gone in found it in client.java and such idk what to change...
and how to i change teleblock... i tb people and other peope tb too and they just type ::home help plz

item.title: Barrage help plz?
item.dc:creator: @barragey0uXD barragey0uXD
item.description:
@barragey0uXD wrote:

[quote=“Lonely Boy, post:4, topic:159983”][quote author=barragey0uXD link=topic=217772.msg1894132#msg1894132 date=1195864951]

if(teleblock == true) {

When you make teleport commands you can put if(teleblock == true) then put under it what to say,
When you make a teleport command and you have the above added, and you get teleblocked then it will send a message you coded it to type.
[/quote]

Dude. Mine works. Trust me.[/quote]
I didnt say it didnt.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrage help plz?
item.dc:creator: @Lonely_Boy Lonely Boy
item.description:
@Lonely_Boy wrote:

Well. Just replace your “home” command with this:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = xxxx; sendMessage("Welcome to the area (Home)"); } }

Change the:

	[code]teleportToX = xxxx;
	teleportToY = xxxx;[/code]

to the x and y axis.

Hope I helped.

If you don’t understand what coords you need. Show me your home command. And add them for you.

Read full topic
